page.title: 17GOING TO SCHOOL
page.content: Every morning my mother wakes me up and then I go down stairs to get ready for school. I have breakfast, get dressed, clean my teeth and put my shoes on then have to wait on the step for a lift to school. When I get there we have to wait until the bell goes then we go in to our classrooms. We have assembly and then do maths until break time at 10.35 a.m. When we come in after break we usually do some English work until dinner. Now there are less children than a year ago we can all go into one sitting for dinner. When we have finished we go out to play until 1.30. We then go in and work until last break. We usually do more interesting things then such as drawing or making things .
